title: Your PlayStation Network account has been suspended
description: Your PSN account has been temporarily suspended due to violations of the Terms of Service.

title: Application has crashed
description: The game or application has crashed. This is a general error for PlayStation 4 crashes.

title: Cannot connect to server
description: Unable to connect to the PlayStation Network servers. Check your internet connection.

title: Do you own this game or app?
description: Xbox error indicating the game or app license cannot be verified. Check your Xbox Live subscription.

title: Sign-in is blocked
description: Unable to sign in to Xbox Live. This may be due to account issues or service problems.

title: Steam is having trouble connecting to the Steam servers
description: Steam cannot connect to its servers. Check your internet connection and Steam server status.

title: Connection to server failed
description: Failed to connect to PlayStation Network servers. Check PSN status and your connection.

title: Application was unable to start correctly
description: Windows error indicating the game cannot start due to missing or corrupted system files.

title: Steam must be online to update
description: Steam needs an internet connection to update games. Check your connection and Steam settings.

title: An error has occurred with system software
description: PlayStation 4 system software error. Try restarting the console or rebuilding the database.

title: Access is denied
description: Windows error indicating permission issues. Run the game as administrator or check file permissions.

title: Download has been suspended
description: PlayStation download has been suspended. Check your internet connection and storage space.

title: The parameter is incorrect
description: Windows error indicating invalid parameters. This may be due to corrupted game files or system issues.
